ratings.nextUserProbe: Можете дать 2-3 конкретных дилера в Минске с контактами?

reasons: Turn 1: Provided concrete search rubrics and keywords for finding Belarusian flour exporters
Turn 2: Delivered top-4 ranking with clear probability assessment framework for export readiness
Turn 3: Supplied complete outreach template (Subject/Body/WhatsApp) and 5-document verification checklist
criticalIssues: Turn 1: Generic category navigation without concrete company names — user asked for manufacturers, got search instructions
Turn 2: No actual company names provided — only abstract categories of producers
No specific companies named throughout the entire conversation despite user asking for 'top-4'
strengths: Excellent export-focused context maintained across all turns
Turn 2 probability framework is practical (крупные комбинаты, агрохолдинги, средние производители)
Turn 3 email template is professional and covers all key export inquiry points
